NetBSD/hpcmips Frequently Asked Questions

This page contains information about NetBSD/hpcmips FAQ.

Booting

  • Is there any way to automatically start an application on a Compact Flashmedium under Windows CE?

PsPc Machine

  • How does one give input to a Palm-sized PC with no keyboard?

Others

  • Can we use IBM microdrive?
  • Can I run NetBSD on Cassiopeia A series ?

Booting

Is there any way to automatically start an application on a Compact Flashmedium under Windows CE? (top)
current status: we have no idea,but forward to improve suspend/resume codes any ideas,working codes welcome.

PsPc Machine

How does one give input to a Palm-sized PC with no keyboard? (top)
connect vt100 to serial connector.

Others

Can we use IBM microdrive? (top)
Yes.If your machine supports IBM microdrive on WinCE environment,it will works fine.on IBM z50,IBM microdrive and PCMCIA TypeIII harddrive supported.but heavy for battery life.

Can I run NetBSD on Cassiopeia A series ? (top)
No. Cassiopeia A series have SH3 CPU, which is not supported by hpcmips. NetBSD/sh3 also does not support Windows CE machine. Of course, we want to support SH3 but we don't have enough time to do it.
